lead_paragraph: Carolina Panthers quarterback Cam Newton weighed into the Charlotte unrest by wearing a T-shirt emblazoned with a famous quote from civil rights activist Martin Luther King Jr. ahead of his team's home game on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Cam Newton Wears Shirt With MLK Quote During Pre-Game Warmup
headline.main: Cam Newton Wears Shirt With MLK Quote During Pre-Game Warmup
